projects.name: Edith Glasses
projects.description: Bone conduction glasses merging hearing aids and wireless audio. Used the PCB from old earbuds, 3D printed a custom casing, and integrated everything for a unique assistive device.

projects.name: Red-light Green-light
projects.description: A real-life version of the Squid Game challenge. Adapted a C++ vision training model to run on an ESP32, tracking movement and triggering a homemade laser tag vest if you moved during 'red light'. Built in a 32-hour hackathon.

links.name: Glowing Under (2nd Year)
links.description: 2D platformer with a focus on puzzle-solving, no-death exploration and storytelling
